items.content_html: TextUtil is a lightweight text manipulation tool built in React, offering essential features like copying text, converting to uppercase/lowercase, capitalizing sentences, removing extra spaces, and clearing text. Designed for efficiency, it provides a user-friendly interface for seamless editing and quick refinements of text.
items.title: HARRY1POTER/TextUtil-App: TextUtil is a lightweight text manipulation tool built in React, offering essential features like copying text, converting to uppercase/lowercase, capitalizing sentences, removing extra spaces, and clearing text. Designed for efficiency, it provides a user-friendly interface for seamless editing and quick refinements of text.

items.content_html: This project is a comprehensive and lightweight boilerplate for building Node.js applications using TypeScript. It comes with a pre-configured setup for Express.js, Docker, MongoDB, Redis, MinIO, and Maildev, along with robust security features and best practices for modern web development.
items.title: fless-lab/node-ts-starter: This project is a comprehensive and lightweight boilerplate for building Node.js applications using TypeScript. It comes with a pre-configured setup for Express.js, Docker, MongoDB, Redis, MinIO, and Maildev, along with robust security features and best practices for modern web development.
